contentrichtext.text: __NOTOC__ {{wiktionary}} '''Next''' can refer to: == Film and stage == * [[Next (2007 film)|''Next'' (2007 film)]], an American film starring Nicolas Cage * [[Players (film)|''Players'' (film)]], a Bollywood film produced under the name ''Next'' * [[Next (play)|''Next'' (play)]], by Terrence McNally * ''[[NEXT: A Primer on Urban Painting]]'', a documentary film released in 2005 * "Next", an animated short film by [[Barry Purves]] == Music == * [[N.EX.T]], a 1990s/early 2000s Korean rock band * [[Next (group)]], a late 1990s/early 2000s American musical group * [[Next (Journey album)|''Next'' (Journey album)]] * [[Next (The Necks album)|''Next'' (The Necks album)]] * [[Next! (Seeed album)|''Next!'' (Seeed album)]] * [[Next (The Sensational Alex Harvey Band album)|''Next'' (The Sensational Alex Harvey Band album)]], 1973 * [[Next (Sevendust album)|''Next'' (Sevendust album)]] * [[Next (Soulive album)|''Next'' (Soulive album)]] * [[Next (Vanessa Williams album)|''Next'' (Vanessa Williams album)]] * "Next", an instrumental piece by Béla Fleck and the Flecktones from their album ''[[Little Worlds]]'' * "Next", a song by [[Raven-Symoné]] * [[1987 (What the Fuck Is Going On?)|Next (The JAMs song)]], a 1987 song by ''The Justified Ancients of Mu Mu'' ==Publications== * [[Next Media]], a pro-democracy publishing company based in Hong Kong, China * [[Next Magazine (Santa Monica)|''Next Magazine'' (Santa Monica)]], a music industry trade publication based in Santa Monica, California, USA * [[Next (novel)|''Next'' (novel)]], a techno-thriller by Michael Crichton * ''[[Next: The Future Just Happened]]'', a 2001 non-fiction book by Michael Lewis ==Science and technology== * [[NeXT]], a 1980s computer company later bought by Apple Inc. * [[NEXT (ion thruster)]], a xenon ion thruster being developed at NASA Glenn Research Center * NEXT, in electronics, an acronym for Near End [[Crosstalk (electronics)|Crosstalk]] * [[New X-ray Telescope]] (NeXT), a Japanese hard X-ray observatory planned for launch in 2013{{update after|2014|01|01}} * [[Stadler NExT]], a Swiss commuter train * NExT, the secondary mission of the [[Stardust (spacecraft)|Stardust space probe]] * [[Project NExT]], a professional development program for mathematicians * [[Yahoo! Next]] a showcase of some of Yahoo!'s newest and upcoming projects ==Television== * [[Next (TV series)|''Next'' (TV series)]], a dating television show on MTV * [[Next (Desperate Housewives episode)|"Next" (''Desperate Housewives'' episode)]] ==Fashion== * [[NEXT Model Management]], a modeling agency * [[Next plc]], a British clothes retailer ==Miscellaneous== * [[Next (cigarettes)]] * [[NeXT (demogroup)]], a French demogroup * [[Next (store)]], a Indian electronics retail chain * [[NEXT (bicycle company)]] * [[Next (restaurant)]] {{disambig}}
